Package client

Class ViewType

java.lang.Object
client.ViewType
public class ViewType extends Object
All the possible view states that the view can be
Version:
1.0-SNAPSHOT
Author:
adellafrattina

  • Field Details

    • MASTER

      public static final String MASTER
      Main view. Consists of search box and login button

    • SETTINGS

      public static final String SETTINGS
      Settings view. Contains theme change option and cancel button

    • LOGIN

      public static final String LOGIN
      Login view. Contains user_id and password input text, create new account button, cancel button and confirm button

    • REGISTRATION

      public static final String REGISTRATION
      Registration view. Contains user_id, surname, name, ssid, email and password input text, option to create or select center, cancel button and confirm button

    • EDIT_PROFILE

      public static final String EDIT_PROFILE
      Edit profile view. Contains user_id, surname, name, ssid, email and password input text, option to create or select center, cancel button and confirm button. The operator's info are already filled out

    • CENTER_CREATION

      public static final String CENTER_CREATION
      Center creation view. Contains center_id, street, house number, postal code, city and district input text, cancel button and confirm button. If the center is being created after registration, there is no cancel button

    • AREA_CREATION

      public static final String AREA_CREATION
      Area creation view. Contains geoname_id, name, ascii name, country code, country name, latitude and longitude input text, cancel button and confirmation button

    • PARAMETER_CREATION

      public static final String PARAMETER_CREATION
      Parameter creation view. Contains geoname_id, center_id, user_id, category, date, time, score and notes input text, cancel button and confirm button

    • CENTER_INFO

      public static final String CENTER_INFO
      Center info view. Contains Contains center_id, street, house number, postal code, city and district input text and cancel button. The center's info are already filled out

    • AREA_INFO

      public static final String AREA_INFO
      Area info view. Contains the area description, a drop-down menu to change center, a button to view the center that monitors the area, a drop-down menu to select the category, the category description, the parameter's table, a cancel button and a button to add a parameter

    • CONNECTION

      public static final String CONNECTION
      Connection view. While the application tires to connect to a server, this view is shown. If the Connection fails, this view tells the user if he wants to retry the connection

    • HELP

      public static final String HELP
      Connection view. Prints out all the available commands in headless configuration and shows the user manual in GUI configuration

  • Constructor Details

      public ViewType()
